title: PRICES REDUCED: N172 Old Judge HOFers - Comiskey, Nichols, Rusie, Griffith

posts.post_title: PRICES REDUCED: N172 Old Judge HOFers - Comiskey, Nichols, Rusie, Griffith
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is an incredible collection of Old Judge HOFers.

John Clarkson - $SOLD
Charles Comiskey - $SOLD
Clark Griffith - [S]$550[/S] $495
Billy Hamilton - $SOLD
Connie Mack - $SOLD
Tommy McCarthy - $SOLD
Kid Nichols - [S]$1,250[/S]  $1,150
Amos Rusie - [S]$995[/S] $925

Images of the back(s) are available upon request.  Paypal friend / no fee is preferred.  First to PM or e-mail me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it" or "I'll take 'em" will be the new owner.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1887%20Clarkson.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1887%20Comiskey.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1889%20Griffith.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1889%20Hamilton_1.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1887%20Mack.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1889%20Nichols.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1889%20Rusie.jpg[/IMG]

Adding McCarthy to the mix...

Don't be shy about offers.  I'm looking to raise money for a purchase, so you might catch me on a good day...

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1887%20McCarthy_1.jpg[/IMG]

P.S. Today is a good day ;)

No real need to bump since this was already at the top, but check it out!  Only four left!  I'm still in a good mood apparently.  Don't miss your chance to get these tough "rookie" OJs!!  No more price cuts after today...
